Spell.Flavor: When you want to kill someone

Spell.Flavor: When you want to kill someone

Spell.Meta: Hits back column and pushes enemies forward

Spell.Meta: Throw axes on all tiles and crack them.

Spell.Meta: Throw multiple axes on player tiles

Spell.Meta: Throw a blade and catch to throw again!

Spell.Meta: Throw a destroyable bomb 4 tiles ahead

Spell.Meta: Charge for 0.5s then fire a powerful shot
Spell.Flavor: If I miss, it means I'm just another dude with a bow

Spell.Name: Breakout
Spell.Flavor: When you need some personal space

Spell.Name: Cold Medicine
Spell.Meta: Heals but applies frost for 0 mana

Spell.Name: Cold Snap
Spell.Flavor: Is it just me or is it cold in here?

Spell.Name: Counter Strike
Spell.Meta: Launch an arrow of energy forward
Spell.Flavor: It protec but it also attac

Spell.Name: Crossfire
Spell.Flavor: Don't get caught in this one

Spell.Meta: Shot deals 10 dmg for each card in deck

Spell.Name: Ember
Spell.Meta: Create a flame 4 tiles in front

Spell.Name: Entangle
Spell.Meta: Hits all tiles in front, Rooting enemies

Spell.Name: Fling
Spell.Meta: Cast spell in other slot and Consume it

Spell.Name: Knock Up

Spell.Name: Frost Barrage
Spell.Meta: Charge for 0.3s then fire a frostbolt in every row

Spell.Name: Frost Volley
Spell.Meta: Charge for 0.3s then fire 4 frostbolts from random tiles

Spell.Name: Frostbite
Spell.Meta: Hit all enemies, dealing 70dmg x frost stacks.

Spell.Name: Frostbolt
Spell.Meta: Charge for 0.15s then fire a frostbolt
Spell.Flavor: This spell isn't just cool, it's Ice Cool

Spell.Name: Heal Catch
Spell.Flavor: Are you really playing catch with yourself?

Spell.Name: Hellfire
Spell.Meta: Hits all tiles, can hit self
Spell.Flavor: Like fire, hellfire, this fire in my skin

Spell.Name: Innervate
Spell.Meta: Gain mana regen til end of battle but slower movement

Spell.Meta: Shoot a projectile that gives the target
